name: io.github.dollhousemcp/mcp-server
title: DollhouseMCP
description: Community-powered AI customization through modular elements. Create, manage, and share personas, skills, templates, agents, and memories for Claude and other MCP-compatible AI assistants.

environmentVariables.name: DOLLHOUSE_PORTFOLIO_DIR
environmentVariables.description: Custom directory for storing your portfolio of elements (default: ~/.dollhouse/portfolio/)

environmentVariables.name: GITHUB_TOKEN
environmentVariables.description: GitHub Personal Access Token for portfolio sync and collection submission (optional, can use OAuth instead)

environmentVariables.name: DOLLHOUSE_DEBUG
environmentVariables.description: Enable debug logging (set to 'true' for verbose output)
